name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: In Sochi, a man who criticized the Sochi games was sentenced to three years in a prison colony. After hearing the sentence, the man said it's still better than a hotel in Sochi.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Some McDonald's restaurants are taking reservations on Valentine's Day. They are getting a lot of tables for one.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: In California, an openly gay candidate is running for office as something called "a new generation Republican." Or as their known in the rest of the country, a Democrat.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Scientists are working on a new contraceptive for women that works for 90 days straight. They are referring to this new contraceptive as sweatpants.
